name: persevering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the quality of continuing to make an effort to do or achieve something, even when this is difficult or takes a long time: He was one of the most determined, stubborn, persevering people I had ever met. She was persevering enough to reach the height of her ambition and become CEO. They have a persevering spirit through hardship.

continuing to exist despite a difficult or changing situation: Football has always been unpredictable and this is the reason for its persevering attraction. It is a persevering and potentially increasing problem. Martin Luther King, Jr. wrote of a necessary spirit of "persistent trying, perpetual experimentation, persevering togetherness". Synonym
